post_text: February 17, 2022 at 5:02 PM#1This workflow can be used to find the correct syntax for changing settings/options usually operated by the GUI.Example: turn off/on webremote:open a commandline feedback window and type list to see the Root of the database,look for something that could hold web-remote settingse.g. #3 "Settings"type CD 3 to change commandline destination to Settingstype Listcheck for something that could hold web-remote settingse.g. #1 "Global"scroll sideways to see all properties of Globale.g.Remotes: Login Disabledenable web-remotes via GUIListe.g.Remotes: Login Enabledtry to change property via commandlineAssign 1 /Remotes="Login Disabled"List to check that it worksAssign 1 /Remotes="Login Enabled"List to check that it workswhen you know the Rootpath (Settings>Global), propertyname (Remotes) and values ("Login Disabled"/"Login Enabled")exit to Root with CD /doublecheck the pathList Root "Settings"."Global"create macros containingAssign Root "Settings"."Global" /Remotes="Login Disabled"Assign Root "Settings"."Global" /Remotes="Login Enabled"
